## âœ… Checklist

Before submitting, please confirm the following:

- [ ] Code follows the project's [Code Style](../CONTRIBUTING.md#-code-style) (Prettier + ESLint).
- [ ] `pnpm lint:check` passes with no errors.
- [ ] `pnpm format:check` passes with no errors.
- [ ] `pnpm test` passes locally.
- [ ] Documentation updated (if applicable).
- [ ] Commit messages follow [Conventional Commits](../CONTRIBUTING.md#-commit-message-guidelines).
- [ ] Breaking changes are clearly marked with `!` in the header or a `BREAKING CHANGE:` footer.
- [ ] No new security issues introduced.
